The #STANDAct would require that at least 70% of Ambassador appointments come from career Foreign Service and Civil Service ranks of the State Department.

See the @ForeignPolicy write-up on the #STANDAct ğŸ‘‡ https://bit.ly/2OygZsJÂ

During a time of increasing complex global challenges and national security threats facing the United States, we must have our most #qualified and #experienced public servants representing the US around the world. #STANDAct
While some political appointees have a wealth of professional experience that contributes to our nation, many individuals have little to no prior diplomatic experience. #STANDAct

Under previous Administrations, roughly 30% of Ambassador positions were filled by political appointees.

Under the Trump Administration, nearly 50% of Ambassador positions are filled by political appointees.

#STANDAct

I introduced the #STANDAct, which would would strengthen the State Department by capping the # of political appointees to Ambassador positions at 30%.
